articles.description: A grandmother, from Florida, left Twitter users in hysterics after revealing she let her young granddaughter decorate her Christmas tree - but she could only reach the bottom branches
articles.content:
An amused mother has revealed the very funny results after her young daughter decorated her mother-in-law's Christmas tree - but could only reach the bottom branches.  
The unnamed toddler's mother,… [+2247 chars]
